job_description: The power systems group in Philips Research supports company wide expertiese in power supplies and converters. We are looking for an intern to join an ongoing project relating to LED lighting development.
job_requirements: - Interest with power electronics, LED lighting- Familiarity with active devices and circuit simulation (SPICE)- Programming (labview, python or C) experienceOpen To All Majors:No
